title: E field - 3 particles Q near conducting sphere Q

content.question: A solid conducting sphere is located near three identical charged particles, each a distance <math alttext="D" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>D</mi></math> from the sphereâ€™s center and arranged as shown in the figure. Each particle has a charge <math alttext="positive Q" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mpadded><mo>+</mo><mi>Q</mi></mpadded></math>, and the solid sphere has a net charge <math alttext="positive Q" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mpadded><mo>+</mo><mi>Q</mi></mpadded></math>. What is the magnitude of the electric field at the center of the solid sphere?

choices.label: <math alttext="k times the fraction Q over D squared, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>k</mi><mfrac><mi>Q</mi><msup><mi>D</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac></math>
<math alttext="2 k times the fraction Q over D squared, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn><mi>k</mi><mfrac><mi>Q</mi><msup><mi>D</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac></math>
<math alttext="3 k times the fraction Q over D squared, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>3</mn><mi>k</mi><mfrac><mi>Q</mi><msup><mi>D</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac></math>

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
